fields.name: identifier
fields.title: Mobile number
fields.description: Enter your mobile number with which you registered in the system
fields.errorMessage: The entered identifier is not valid

fields.name: username
fields.title: Username
fields.description: The entry argument must have English Lowercase Letters.
fields.errorMessage: username must have Lowercase and minimum 3characters and maximum 15 characters

fields.name: first_name
fields.title: Name
fields.errorMessage: First name must be english with at least two characters and maximum 30 characters.

fields.name: last_name
fields.title: Last name
fields.errorMessage: Last name must be english with at least two characters.

fields.name: newPassword
fields.title: Password
fields.info: The password must be a combination of lowercase letters, uppercase letters and English numbers and special characters such as (&, $, #, @, ^, % and...) and at least 8 and at most 20 characters.
fields.description: The value of the password is at least 8 digits and at most 20 digits,which must be a combination of lowercase letters and numbers (such as! Or @ or #, etc.)
fields.errorMessage: The entered password is not acceptable.
